attributes.action: We the people of the UK have no confidence in the House of Commons.
attributes.additional_details: We the UK public wish to express our dissatisfaction with the present House of Commons, the Speaker, the Prime Minister, Leader of the Opposition and all MPs in their inability to resolve Brexit.  They have also failed to provide a route for the public to provide guidance in the form of a Brexit referendum or to unblock the stalemate in the House of Commons via a general election.
attributes.background: The conduct of both the Government and Opposition party MPs fails to meet the expectations of the UK. They prevented any movement on Brexit or provided a resolution via a referendum to provide clarity or General Election to replace the House of Commons with one that can clear the BREXIT deal lock.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence.
